captureFrequency.powLineLocationTxt: What power line frequency is used at your location?
captureFrequency.infoTxt: Set the correct power line frequency in order to prevent image flickering. Select 50 Hz or 60 Hz and click OK to continue.
captureFrequency.noteTxt: Note: Power line frequency is different in different geographic regions. In the Americas, 60 Hz is usually used; most other parts of the world use 50 Hz. Local variations may apply, always check with the local authorities.
